body:
[The Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit](https://github.com/Microsoft/CNTK) (https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/product/cognitive-toolkit/), is a unified deep-learning toolkit that describes neural networks as a series of computational steps via a directed graph. 

- [x] Add package cntk1bitsgd.
- [x] Add Multiverso (~~PRs https://github.com/Microsoft/Multiverso/pull/144  https://github.com/Microsoft/Multiverso/pull/145 are pending.~~ Patch it in Spack).
- [x] Patch CNTK's build process so it use the externaly-installed libraries. (~~PR https://github.com/Microsoft/CNTK/pull/1714 is pending.~~ Patch it in Spack) .
- [x] Patch kaldi and openfst (waiting #3806 to be merged).
- [x] Add cpu-version cntk.
- [x] Add gpu-version.
title: A new package: CNTK.
